languages.text: Иокаста Зауэрбэк была поражена вероломной изменой свое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Но клятва верности не позволяла ей поднять оружие против свое{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана. Посему Мастер дисциплины оставила пост и призвала двух доверенных телохранителей при оружии. Преданные слуги исполнили последний приказ Леди Зауэрбэк и помогли ей выйти из затруднительной ситуации, не уронив своей чести.

Jocasta Sauerback was stunned by her Lord Captain's treason. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore, the Master-at-Arms resigned from her position and summoned two of her trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Jocasta's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.
languages.original_text: Иокаста Зауэрбэк была поражена вероломной изменой свое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Но клятва верности не позволяла ей поднять оружие против свое{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана. Посему Мастер дисциплины оставила пост и призвала двух доверенных телохранителей при оружии. Преданные слуги исполнили последний приказ Леди Зауэрбэк и помогли ей выйти из затруднительной ситуации, не уронив своей чести.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback was dumbfounded by her Lord Captain's treachery and double-crossing. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore the Master-at-Arms resigned from her positions and summoned two trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Lady Sauerback's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

Therefore the Master-at-Arms resigned from her positions and summoned two trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Lady Sauerback's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback war angesichts des Verrats ihres Lord Captains fassungslos. Allerdings verbot ihr ihr eigener Treueschwur, ihre Waffen gegen {mf|ihren Vorgesetzten|ihre Vorgesetzte} zu erheben. Also trat die Waffenmeisterin von ihrem Amt zurück und rief zwei ihrer loyalen, bewaffneten Leibwächter. Die treuen Diener führten Jocastas letzte Befehle aus und halfen ihr, das Problem zu lösen, ohne ihre Ehre zu verlieren.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback was stunned by her Lord Captain's treason. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore, the Master-at-Arms resigned from her position and summoned two of her trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Jocasta's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback war angesichts des Verrats ihres Lord Captains fassungslos. Allerdings verbot ihr ihr eigener Treueschwur, ihre Waffen gegen {mf|ihren Vorgesetzten|ihre Vorgesetzte} zu erheben. Also trat die Waffenmeisterin von ihrem Amt zurück und rief zwei ihrer loyalen, bewaffneten Leibwächter. Die treuen Diener führten Jocastas letzte Befehle aus und halfen ihr, das Problem zu lösen, ohne ihre Ehre zu verlieren.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback reçut la trahison de {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} comme un coup de massue. Cependant, son propre serment de loyauté lui interdisant de retourner ses armes contre {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}, la capitaine d'armes démissionna de ses fonctions et convoqua deux de ses plus fidèles gardes du corps. Armés jusqu'aux dents, ces derniers exécutèrent les derniers ordres de leur supérieure et l'aidèrent à résoudre ce dilemme cornélien sans pour autant compromettre son honneur.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback was stunned by her Lord Captain's treason. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore, the Master-at-Arms resigned from her position and summoned two of her trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Jocasta's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback reçut la trahison de {mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} comme un coup de massue. Cependant, son propre serment de loyauté lui interdisant de retourner ses armes contre {mf|son maître|sa maîtresse}, la capitaine d'armes démissionna de ses fonctions et convoqua deux de ses plus fidèles gardes du corps. Armés jusqu'aux dents, ces derniers exécutèrent les derniers ordres de leur supérieure et l'aidèrent à résoudre ce dilemme cornélien sans pour autant compromettre son honneur.

languages.text: Jocasta Sauerback quedó anonadada por la traición de su Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, su juramento de lealtad le impedía dirigir sus armas contra la persona a la que servía. Por eso, la maestra de armas abandonó su cargo e hizo llamar a dos de sus guardaespaldas más fieles y mejor armados. Los sirvientes cumplieron la última orden de Jocasta, ayudándola a resolver su dilema sin pérdida de honor.
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback was stunned by her Lord Captain's treason. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore, the Master-at-Arms resigned from her position and summoned two of her trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Jocasta's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

traits.locale_text: Jocasta Sauerback quedó anonadada por la traición de su Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, su juramento de lealtad le impedía dirigir sus armas contra la persona a la que servía. Por eso, la maestra de armas abandonó su cargo e hizo llamar a dos de sus guardaespaldas más fieles y mejor armados. Los sirvientes cumplieron la última orden de Jocasta, ayudándola a resolver su dilema sin pérdida de honor.

languages.text: ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックはロード・キャプテンの反逆に呆然とした。しかし、彼女自身の忠誠の誓いは、仕える者に武器を向けることを禁じていた。それ故にマスター・アット・アームはその地位を退き、信頼できる、武装したボディーガードを2人呼び寄せた。忠実な従者たちはジョカスタの最後の命令を遂行することで、彼女が名誉を失うことなく、彼女が抱えた困難な問題を解決する手助けをした。
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback was stunned by her Lord Captain's treason. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore, the Master-at-Arms resigned from her position and summoned two of her trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Jocasta's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

traits.locale_text: ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックはロード・キャプテンの反逆に呆然とした。しかし、彼女自身の忠誠の誓いは、仕える者に武器を向けることを禁じていた。それ故にマスター・アット・アームはその地位を退き、信頼できる、武装したボディーガードを2人呼び寄せた。忠実な従者たちはジョカスタの最後の命令を遂行することで、彼女が名誉を失うことなく、彼女が抱えた困難な問題を解決する手助けをした。

languages.text: 行商浪人的背叛让约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克震惊不已。然而她许下了忠诚誓言，她无法举起武器，瞄准她发誓效忠的人。因此，戒律大师辞去了她的职位，召来了她最信任的两名武装护卫。护卫忠诚地执行了约卡斯塔最后的命令，帮助她摆脱了两难的处境，没有玷污她的荣耀。
languages.original_text: Jocasta Sauerback was stunned by her Lord Captain's treason. However, her own oath of loyalty forbade her from turning her weapons against the one she served. Therefore, the Master-at-Arms resigned from her position and summoned two of her trusted, armed bodyguards. The loyal servants carried out Jocasta's last orders and helped her solve her conundrum with no loss of honour.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的背叛让约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克震惊不已。然而她许下了忠诚誓言，她无法举起武器，瞄准她发誓效忠的人。因此，戒律大师辞去了她的职位，召来了她最信任的两名武装护卫。护卫忠诚地执行了约卡斯塔最后的命令，帮助她摆脱了两难的处境，没有玷污她的荣耀。
